# Troubleshooting

* Some participants reported an issue in installing ClimMobTools using the function `remotes::install_github()`, which seems to be a known issue for Windows users, read more [here](https://github.com/r-lib/remotes/issues/130). If you face the same issue, use the command `install.packages("ClimMobTools")` instead.
